name: ent-Kaur-16-ene,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (hydroxylating)
definition: Kaur-16-en-18-ol + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> Kaur-16-en-18-al + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 2 H2O
comment: the second step of three-step reaction (see R10066, R06291+R06292+R06293)
